name: Transavia
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: transavia
Developer Terms of Use
des:
With the Transavia skill on Alexa you can jump-start your travel planning. We help you find the best deals by just using your voice!
We are thrilled to be the first airline who optimized the experience for the Echo Show.
 
Already got your destination in mind? Check our prices and schedule for over 100 destinations in Europe and beyond! Travelling with Transavia is literally at your command.
 
To enhance and speed up the process we remember your preferred places you want to fly from and to. We also show the results on your smart phone to give you a clear overview. 

Just give it a spin and see how Transavia’s Alexa skill can help you find flights.
 
To start just say: "Alexa ask Transavia"
 
Transavia cares a great deal about your personal information. That is why it is important to read the privacy policy of Transavia. Please note that the Alexa skill may use any data you provide via the app, we advise you to consult Amazon's privacy policy as well.
